name: Todo List DApp
description: A decentralized Todo List built on the Ethereum blockchain using Solidity for smart contracts and a React/NextJS frontend.

name: Chicken Token Swap
description: A decentralized exchange (DEX) platform that enables users to swap tokens directly from a predefined token list.

name: The Lamongan Project
description: Inspired by Lamongan, an Indonesian street food. The purpose is to introduce Indonesian street food to the world through NFT.

name: Crowdfunding DApp
description: Crowdfunding DApp Enables users to create and participate in crowdfunding campaigns using blockchain technology. Built with Next.js and the Thirdweb library.
